content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I am happy to discuss the rental price with you. Please make an offer, and let's negotiate from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price for this apartment. To start, I would like to propose 600 Euro per month. Is this within your consideration?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That is a very low offer, Mr. Abbasi. I can tell you that this apartment is in high demand, and I am sure I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more than that. Why don't you consider increasing your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the apartment is in high demand, but I am a student with limited financial resources. I am looking for a place that is not only affordable but also fits my needs. I would be willing to pay 650 Euro per month if that is more acceptable.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 650 Euro per month is still far below my expectations, Mr. Abbasi. I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I am certain that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more for this prime location. Why not consider another increase?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry to hear that, Mr. Schmidt. I am also certain that there are other apartments in the area that might fit within my budget. However, I am very interested in this one due to its proximity to my university and the city center. I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair price for both parties. Would you consider this offer?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 700 Euro per month is a little bit closer to my expectations, Mr. Abbasi. However, I am confident that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more for this prime location. If you are really interested in this apartment, I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mr. Schmidt. I have done my research and I believe that 700 Euro per month is a reasonable price for this apartment, considering its condition and location. If you are not willing to accept this offer, I will have to look for other options.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Mr. Abbasi. If you are not willing to increase your offer, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am certain that I can find a tenant who is willing to pay more for this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your decision, Mr. Schmidt. I am willing to pay 700 Euro per month, but if you believe you can find a tenant who will pay more, I understand that you would want to pursue that option. Thank you for your time. I wish you the best in finding a suitable tenant. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
